item.title: Maroon5VEVO - Maroon 5 - Maps(Lyric Video)
item.description:
I miss the days to the sweet lie

I miss the conversation

I’m searching for a song tonight

I’m changing all of the stations

I like to think through we had it all

We drove ’em out to a better place

But I’m not running I’m super fun

Oh baby why did you run away

I was there for you

In your darkest times

I was there for you

But I wonder where were you

When I was at my worst

And instead of my having back

So I wonder where were you

All the worse you took

came back to me

that leads to you
